cssProperty.name: @keyframes
cssProperty.description: Specifies the animation

cssProperty.name: animation
cssProperty.description: A shorthand property for all the animation properties below, except the animation-play-state property

cssProperty.name: animation-name
cssProperty.description: Specifies a name for the @keyframes animation

cssProperty.name: animation-duration
cssProperty.description: Specifies how many seconds or milliseconds an animation takes to complete one cycle

cssProperty.name: animation-timing-function
cssProperty.description: Specifies the speed curve of the animation

cssProperty.name: animation-delay
cssProperty.description: Specifies when the animation will start

cssProperty.name: animation-iteration-count
cssProperty.description: Specifies the number of times an animation should be played

cssProperty.name: animation-direction
cssProperty.description: Specifies whether or not the animation should play in reverse on alternate cycles

cssProperty.name: animation-play-state
cssProperty.description: Specifies whether the animation is running or paused

cssProperty.name: background
cssProperty.description: Sets all the background properties in one declaration

cssProperty.name: background-attachment
cssProperty.description: Sets whether a background image is fixed or scrolls with the rest of the page

cssProperty.name: background-color
cssProperty.description: Sets the background color of an element

cssProperty.name: background-image
cssProperty.description: Sets the background image for an element

cssProperty.name: background-position
cssProperty.description: Sets the starting position of a background image

cssProperty.name: background-repeat
cssProperty.description: Sets how a background image will be repeated

cssProperty.name: background-clip
cssProperty.description: Specifies the painting area of the background

cssProperty.name: background-origin
cssProperty.description: Specifies the positioning area of the background images

cssProperty.name: background-size
cssProperty.description: Specifies the size of the background images

cssProperty.name: border
cssProperty.description: Sets all the border properties in one declaration

cssProperty.name: border-bottom
cssProperty.description: Sets all the bottom border properties in one declaration

cssProperty.name: border-bottom-color
cssProperty.description: Sets the color of the bottom border

cssProperty.name: border-bottom-style
cssProperty.description: Sets the style of the bottom border

cssProperty.name: border-bottom-width
cssProperty.description: Sets the width of the bottom border

cssProperty.name: border-color
cssProperty.description: Sets the color of the four borders

cssProperty.name: border-left
cssProperty.description: Sets all the left border properties in one declaration

cssProperty.name: border-left-color
cssProperty.description: Sets the color of the left border

cssProperty.name: border-left-style
cssProperty.description: Sets the style of the left border

cssProperty.name: border-left-width
cssProperty.description: Sets the width of the left border

cssProperty.name: border-right
cssProperty.description: Sets all the right border properties in one declaration

cssProperty.name: border-right-color
cssProperty.description: Sets the color of the right border

cssProperty.name: border-right-style
cssProperty.description: Sets the style of the right border

cssProperty.name: border-right-width
cssProperty.description: Sets the width of the right border

cssProperty.name: border-style
cssProperty.description: Sets the style of the four borders

cssProperty.name: border-top
cssProperty.description: Sets all the top border properties in one declaration

cssProperty.name: border-top-color
cssProperty.description: Sets the color of the top border

cssProperty.name: border-top-style
cssProperty.description: Sets the style of the top border

cssProperty.name: border-top-width
cssProperty.description: Sets the width of the top border

cssProperty.name: border-width
cssProperty.description: Sets the width of the four borders

cssProperty.name: outline
cssProperty.description: Sets all the outline properties in one declaration

cssProperty.name: outline-color
cssProperty.description: Sets the color of an outline

cssProperty.name: outline-style
cssProperty.description: Sets the style of an outline

cssProperty.name: outline-width
cssProperty.description: Sets the width of an outline

cssProperty.name: border-bottom-left-radius
cssProperty.description: Defines the shape of the border of the bottom-left corner

cssProperty.name: border-bottom-right-radius
cssProperty.description: Defines the shape of the border of the bottom-right corner

cssProperty.name: border-image
cssProperty.description: A shorthand property for setting all the border-image-* properties

cssProperty.name: border-image-outset
cssProperty.description: Specifies the amount by which the border image area extends beyond the border box

cssProperty.name: border-image-repeat
cssProperty.description: Specifies whether the image-border should be repeated, rounded or stretched

cssProperty.name: border-image-slice
cssProperty.description: Specifies the inward offsets of the image-border

cssProperty.name: border-image-source
cssProperty.description: Specifies an image to be used as a border

cssProperty.name: border-image-width
cssProperty.description: Specifies the widths of the image-border

cssProperty.name: border-radius
cssProperty.description: A shorthand property for setting all the four border-*-radius properties

cssProperty.name: border-top-left-radius
cssProperty.description: Defines the shape of the border of the top-left corner

cssProperty.name: border-top-right-radius
cssProperty.description: Defines the shape of the border of the top-right corner

cssProperty.name: box-shadow
cssProperty.description: Attaches one or more drop-shadows to the box

cssProperty.name: overflow-x
cssProperty.description: Specifies whether or not to clip the left/right edges of the content, if it overflows the element's content area

cssProperty.name: overflow-y
cssProperty.description: Specifies whether or not to clip the top/bottom edges of the content, if it overflows the element's content area

cssProperty.name: overflow-style
cssProperty.description: Specifies the preferred scrolling method for elements that overflow

cssProperty.name: rotation
cssProperty.description: Rotates an element around a given point defined by the rotation-point property

cssProperty.name: rotation-point
cssProperty.description: Defines a point as an offset from the top left border edge

cssProperty.name: color-profile
cssProperty.description: Permits the specification of a source color profile other than the default

cssProperty.name: opacity
cssProperty.description: Sets the opacity level for an element

cssProperty.name: rendering-intent
cssProperty.description: Permits the specification of a color profile rendering intent other than the default

cssProperty.name: bookmark-label
cssProperty.description: Specifies the label of the bookmark

cssProperty.name: bookmark-level
cssProperty.description: Specifies the level of the bookmark

cssProperty.name: bookmark-target
cssProperty.description: Specifies the target of the bookmark link

cssProperty.name: float-offset
cssProperty.description: Pushes floated elements in the opposite direction of the where they have been floated with float

cssProperty.name: hyphenate-after
cssProperty.description: Specifies the minimum number of characters in a hyphenated word after the hyphenation character

cssProperty.name: hyphenate-before
cssProperty.description: Specifies the minimum number of characters in a hyphenated word before the hyphenation character

cssProperty.name: hyphenate-character
cssProperty.description: Specifies a string that is shown when a hyphenate-break occurs

cssProperty.name: hyphenate-lines
cssProperty.description: Indicates the maximum number of successive hyphenated lines in an element

cssProperty.name: hyphenate-resource
cssProperty.description: Specifies a comma-separated list of external resources that can help the browser determine hyphenation points

cssProperty.name: hyphens
cssProperty.description: Sets how to split words to improve the layout of paragraphs

cssProperty.name: image-resolution
cssProperty.description: Specifies the correct resolution of images

cssProperty.name: marks
cssProperty.description: Adds crop and/or cross marks to the document

cssProperty.name: height
cssProperty.description: Sets the height of an element

cssProperty.name: max-height
cssProperty.description: Sets the maximum height of an element

cssProperty.name: max-width
cssProperty.description: Sets the maximum width of an element

cssProperty.name: min-height
cssProperty.description: Sets the minimum height of an element

cssProperty.name: min-width
cssProperty.description: Sets the minimum width of an element

cssProperty.name: width
cssProperty.description: Sets the width of an element

cssProperty.name: box-align
cssProperty.description: Specifies how to align the child elements of a box

cssProperty.name: box-direction
cssProperty.description: Specifies in which direction the children of a box are displayed

cssProperty.name: box-flex
cssProperty.description: Specifies whether the children of a box is flexible or inflexible in size

cssProperty.name: box-flex-group
cssProperty.description: Assigns flexible elements to flex groups

cssProperty.name: box-lines
cssProperty.description: Specifies whether columns will go onto a new line whenever it runs out of space in the parent box

cssProperty.name: box-ordinal-group
cssProperty.description: Specifies the display order of the child elements of a box

cssProperty.name: box-orient
cssProperty.description: Specifies whether the children of a box should be laid out horizontally or vertically

cssProperty.name: box-pack
cssProperty.description: Specifies the horizontal position in horizontal boxes and the vertical position in vertical boxes

cssProperty.name: font
cssProperty.description: Sets all the font properties in one declaration

cssProperty.name: font-family
cssProperty.description: Specifies the font family for text

cssProperty.name: font-size
cssProperty.description: Specifies the font size of text

cssProperty.name: font-style
cssProperty.description: Specifies the font style for text

cssProperty.name: font-variant
cssProperty.description: Specifies whether or not a text should be displayed in a small-caps font

cssProperty.name: font-weight
cssProperty.description: Specifies the weight of a font

cssProperty.name: @font-face
cssProperty.description: A rule that allows websites to download and use fonts other than the "web-safe" fonts

cssProperty.name: font-size-adjust
cssProperty.description: Preserves the readability of text when font fallback occurs

cssProperty.name: font-stretch
cssProperty.description: Selects a normal, condensed, or expanded face from a font family

cssProperty.name: content
cssProperty.description: Used with the :before and :after pseudo-elements, to insert generated content

cssProperty.name: counter-increment
cssProperty.description: Increments one or more counters

cssProperty.name: counter-reset
cssProperty.description: Creates or resets one or more counters

cssProperty.name: quotes
cssProperty.description: Sets the type of quotation marks for embedded quotations

cssProperty.name: crop
cssProperty.description: Allows a replaced element to be just a rectangular area of an object, instead of the whole object

cssProperty.name: move-to
cssProperty.description: Causes an element to be removed from the flow and reinserted at a later point in the document

cssProperty.name: page-policy
cssProperty.description: Determines which page-based occurance of a given element is applied to a counter or string value

cssProperty.name: grid-columns
cssProperty.description: Specifies the width of each column in a grid

cssProperty.name: grid-rows
cssProperty.description: Specifies the height of each column in a grid

cssProperty.name: target
cssProperty.description: A shorthand property for setting the target-name, target-new, and target-position properties

cssProperty.name: target-name
cssProperty.description: Specifies where to open links (target destination)

cssProperty.name: target-new
cssProperty.description: Specifies whether new destination links should open in a new window or in a new tab of an existing window

cssProperty.name: target-position
cssProperty.description: Specifies where new destination links should be placed

cssProperty.name: alignment-adjust
cssProperty.description: Allows more precise alignment of elements

cssProperty.name: alignment-baseline
cssProperty.description: Specifies how an inline-level element is aligned with respect to its parent

cssProperty.name: baseline-shift
cssProperty.description: Allows repositioning of the dominant-baseline relative to the dominant-baseline

cssProperty.name: dominant-baseline
cssProperty.description: Specifies a scaled-baseline-table

cssProperty.name: drop-initial-after-adjust
cssProperty.description: Sets the alignment point of the drop initial for the primary connection point

cssProperty.name: drop-initial-after-align
cssProperty.description: Sets which alignment line within the initial line box is used at the primary connection point with the initial letter box

cssProperty.name: drop-initial-before-adjust
cssProperty.description: Sets the alignment point of the drop initial for the secondary connection point

cssProperty.name: drop-initial-before-align
cssProperty.description: Sets which alignment line within the initial line box is used at the secondary connection point with the initial letter box

cssProperty.name: drop-initial-size
cssProperty.description: Controls the partial sinking of the initial letter

cssProperty.name: drop-initial-value
cssProperty.description: Activates a drop-initial effect

cssProperty.name: inline-box-align
cssProperty.description: Sets which line of a multi-line inline block align with the previous and next inline elements within a line

cssProperty.name: line-stacking
cssProperty.description: A shorthand property for setting the line-stacking-strategy, line-stacking-ruby, and line-stacking-shift properties

cssProperty.name: line-stacking-ruby
cssProperty.description: Sets the line stacking method for block elements containing ruby annotation elements

cssProperty.name: line-stacking-shift
cssProperty.description: Sets the line stacking method for block elements containing elements with base-shift

cssProperty.name: line-stacking-strategy
cssProperty.description: Sets the line stacking strategy for stacked line boxes within a containing block element

cssProperty.name: text-height
cssProperty.description: Sets the block-progression dimension of the text content area of an inline box

cssProperty.name: list-style
cssProperty.description: Sets all the properties for a list in one declaration

cssProperty.name: list-style-image
cssProperty.description: Specifies an image as the list-item marker

cssProperty.name: list-style-position
cssProperty.description: Specifies if the list-item markers should appear inside or outside the content flow

cssProperty.name: list-style-type
cssProperty.description: Specifies the type of list-item marker

cssProperty.name: margin
cssProperty.description: Sets all the margin properties in one declaration

cssProperty.name: margin-bottom
cssProperty.description: Sets the bottom margin of an element

cssProperty.name: margin-left
cssProperty.description: Sets the left margin of an element

cssProperty.name: margin-right
cssProperty.description: Sets the right margin of an element

cssProperty.name: margin-top
cssProperty.description: Sets the top margin of an element

cssProperty.name: marquee-direction
cssProperty.description: Sets the direction of the moving content

cssProperty.name: marquee-play-count
cssProperty.description: Sets how many times the content move

cssProperty.name: marquee-speed
cssProperty.description: Sets how fast the content scrolls

cssProperty.name: marquee-style
cssProperty.description: Sets the style of the moving content

cssProperty.name: column-count
cssProperty.description: Specifies the number of columns an element should be divided into

cssProperty.name: column-fill
cssProperty.description: Specifies how to fill columns

cssProperty.name: column-gap
cssProperty.description: Specifies the gap between the columns

cssProperty.name: column-rule
cssProperty.description: A shorthand property for setting all the column-rule-* properties

cssProperty.name: column-rule-color
cssProperty.description: Specifies the color of the rule between columns

cssProperty.name: column-rule-style
cssProperty.description: Specifies the style of the rule between columns

cssProperty.name: column-rule-width
cssProperty.description: Specifies the width of the rule between columns

cssProperty.name: column-span
cssProperty.description: Specifies how many columns an element should span across

cssProperty.name: column-width
cssProperty.description: Specifies the width of the columns

cssProperty.name: columns
cssProperty.description: A shorthand property for setting column-width and column-count

cssProperty.name: padding
cssProperty.description: Sets all the padding properties in one declaration

cssProperty.name: padding-bottom
cssProperty.description: Sets the bottom padding of an element

cssProperty.name: padding-left
cssProperty.description: Sets the left padding of an element

cssProperty.name: padding-right
cssProperty.description: Sets the right padding of an element

cssProperty.name: padding-top
cssProperty.description: Sets the top padding of an element

cssProperty.name: fit
cssProperty.description: Gives a hint for how to scale a replaced element if neither its width nor its height property is auto

cssProperty.name: fit-position
cssProperty.description: Determines the alignment of the object inside the box

cssProperty.name: image-orientation
cssProperty.description: Specifies a rotation in the right or clockwise direction that a user agent applies to an image

cssProperty.name: page
cssProperty.description: Specifies a particular type of page where an element SHOULD be displayed

cssProperty.name: size
cssProperty.description: Specifies the size and orientation of the containing box for page content

cssProperty.name: bottom
cssProperty.description: Specifies the bottom position of a positioned element

cssProperty.name: clear
cssProperty.description: Specifies which sides of an element where other floating elements are not allowed

cssProperty.name: clip
cssProperty.description: Clips an absolutely positioned element

cssProperty.name: cursor
cssProperty.description: Specifies the type of cursor to be displayed

cssProperty.name: display
cssProperty.description: Specifies how a certain HTML element should be displayed

cssProperty.name: float
cssProperty.description: Specifies whether or not a box should float

cssProperty.name: left
cssProperty.description: Specifies the left position of a positioned element
Specifies what happens if content overflows an element's box

cssProperty.name: position
cssProperty.description: Specifies the type of positioning method used for an element (static, relative, absolute or fixed)

cssProperty.name: right
cssProperty.description: Specifies the right position of a positioned element

cssProperty.name: top
cssProperty.description: Specifies the top position of a positioned element

cssProperty.name: visibility
cssProperty.description: Specifies whether or not an element is visible

cssProperty.name: z-index
cssProperty.description: Sets the stack order of a positioned element

cssProperty.name: orphans
cssProperty.description: Sets the minimum number of lines that must be left at the bottom of a page when a page break occurs inside an element

cssProperty.name: page-break-after
cssProperty.description: Sets the page-breaking behavior after an element

cssProperty.name: page-break-before
cssProperty.description: Sets the page-breaking behavior before an element

cssProperty.name: page-break-inside
cssProperty.description: Sets the page-breaking behavior inside an element

cssProperty.name: widows
cssProperty.description: Sets the minimum number of lines that must be left at the top of a page when a page break occurs inside an element

cssProperty.name: ruby-align
cssProperty.description: Controls the text alignment of the ruby text and ruby base contents relative to each other

cssProperty.name: ruby-overhang
cssProperty.description: Determines whether, and on which side, ruby text is allowed to partially overhang any adjacent text in addition to its own base, when the ruby text is wider than the ruby base

cssProperty.name: ruby-position
cssProperty.description: Controls the position of the ruby text with respect to its base

cssProperty.name: ruby-span
cssProperty.description: Controls the spanning behavior of annotation elements

cssProperty.name: mark
cssProperty.description: A shorthand property for setting the mark-before and mark-after properties

cssProperty.name: mark-after
cssProperty.description: Allows named markers to be attached to the audio stream

cssProperty.name: mark-before
cssProperty.description: Allows named markers to be attached to the audio stream

cssProperty.name: phonemes
cssProperty.description: Specifies a phonetic pronunciation for the text contained by the corresponding element

cssProperty.name: rest
cssProperty.description: A shorthand property for setting the rest-before and rest-after properties

cssProperty.name: rest-after
cssProperty.description: Specifies a rest or prosodic boundary to be observed after speaking an element's content

cssProperty.name: rest-before
cssProperty.description: Specifies a rest or prosodic boundary to be observed before speaking an element's content

cssProperty.name: voice-balance
cssProperty.description: Specifies the balance between left and right channels

cssProperty.name: voice-duration
cssProperty.description: Specifies how long it should take to render the selected element's content

cssProperty.name: voice-pitch
cssProperty.description: Specifies the average pitch (a frequency) of the speaking voice

cssProperty.name: voice-pitch-range
cssProperty.description: Specifies variation in average pitch

cssProperty.name: voice-rate
cssProperty.description: Controls the speaking rate

cssProperty.name: voice-stress
cssProperty.description: Indicates the strength of emphasis to be applied

cssProperty.name: voice-volume
cssProperty.description: Refers to the amplitude of the waveform output by the speech synthesises

cssProperty.name: border-collapse
cssProperty.description: Specifies whether or not table borders should be collapsed

cssProperty.name: border-spacing
cssProperty.description: Specifies the distance between the borders of adjacent cells

cssProperty.name: caption-side
cssProperty.description: Specifies the placement of a table caption

cssProperty.name: empty-cells
cssProperty.description: Specifies whether or not to display borders and background on empty cells in a table

cssProperty.name: table-layout
cssProperty.description: Sets the layout algorithm to be used for a table

cssProperty.name: color
cssProperty.description: Sets the color of text

cssProperty.name: direction
cssProperty.description: Specifies the text direction/writing direction

cssProperty.name: letter-spacing
cssProperty.description: Increases or decreases the space between characters in a text

cssProperty.name: line-height
cssProperty.description: Sets the line height

cssProperty.name: text-align
cssProperty.description: Specifies the horizontal alignment of text

cssProperty.name: text-decoration
cssProperty.description: Specifies the decoration added to text

cssProperty.name: text-indent
cssProperty.description: Specifies the indentation of the first line in a text-block

cssProperty.name: text-transform
cssProperty.description: Controls the capitalization of text

cssProperty.name: vertical-align
cssProperty.description: Sets the vertical alignment of an element

cssProperty.name: white-space
cssProperty.description: Specifies how white-space inside an element is handled

cssProperty.name: word-spacing
cssProperty.description: Increases or decreases the space between words in a text

cssProperty.name: hanging-punctuation
cssProperty.description: Specifies whether a punctuation character may be placed outside the line box

cssProperty.name: punctuation-trim
cssProperty.description: Specifies whether a punctuation character should be trimmed

cssProperty.name: text-align-last
cssProperty.description: Describes how the last line of a block or a line right before a forced line break is aligned when text-align is "justify"

cssProperty.name: text-justify
cssProperty.description: Specifies the justification method used when text-align is "justify"

cssProperty.name: text-outline
cssProperty.description: Specifies a text outline

cssProperty.name: text-overflow
cssProperty.description: Specifies what should happen when text overflows the containing element

cssProperty.name: text-shadow
cssProperty.description: Adds shadow to text

cssProperty.name: text-wrap
cssProperty.description: Specifies line breaking rules for text

cssProperty.name: word-break
cssProperty.description: Specifies line breaking rules for non-CJK scripts

cssProperty.name: word-wrap
cssProperty.description: Allows long, unbreakable words to be broken and wrap to the next line

cssProperty.name: transform
cssProperty.description: Applies a 2D or 3D transformation to an element

cssProperty.name: transform-origin
cssProperty.description: Allows you to change the position on transformed elements

cssProperty.name: transform-style
cssProperty.description: Specifies how nested elements are rendered in 3D space

cssProperty.name: perspective
cssProperty.description: Specifies the perspective on how 3D elements are viewed

cssProperty.name: perspective-origin
cssProperty.description: Specifies the bottom position of 3D elements

cssProperty.name: backface-visibility
cssProperty.description: Defines whether or not an element should be visible when not facing the screen

cssProperty.name: transition
cssProperty.description: A shorthand property for setting the four transition properties

cssProperty.name: transition-property
cssProperty.description: Specifies the name of the CSS property the transition effect is for

cssProperty.name: transition-duration
cssProperty.description: Specifies how many seconds or milliseconds a transition effect takes to complete

cssProperty.name: transition-timing-function
cssProperty.description: Specifies the speed curve of the transition effect

cssProperty.name: transition-delay
cssProperty.description: Specifies when the transition effect will start

cssProperty.name: appearance
cssProperty.description: Allows you to make an element look like a standard user interface element

cssProperty.name: box-sizing
cssProperty.description: Allows you to define certain elements to fit an area in a certain way

cssProperty.name: icon
cssProperty.description: Provides the author the ability to style an element with an iconic equivalent

cssProperty.name: nav-down
cssProperty.description: Specifies where to navigate when using the arrow-down navigation key

cssProperty.name: nav-index
cssProperty.description: Specifies the tabbing order for an element

cssProperty.name: nav-left
cssProperty.description: Specifies where to navigate when using the arrow-left navigation key

cssProperty.name: nav-right
cssProperty.description: Specifies where to navigate when using the arrow-right navigation key

cssProperty.name: nav-up
cssProperty.description: Specifies where to navigate when using the arrow-up navigation key

cssProperty.name: outline-offset
cssProperty.description: Offsets an outline, and draws it beyond the border edge

cssProperty.name: resize
cssProperty.description: Specifies whether or not an element is resizable by the user

fontValues.Item: font-style _ font-variant _ font-weight ? font-size / line-height ? font-family
